body.p: The Board noted that if assumptions for each interim reporting period were updated to the most recent interim date, the measurement of the entity’s annual amounts would be affected by how frequently the entity reports, ie whether the entity reports quarterly, half‑yearly or with no interim period. In the Board’s view this would not be consistent with the requirements of paragraphs 28 and 29 of IAS 34.
